name: Cyber Soldiers in Cyber Houses
description:
An existential horror I-spy computer game that includes animation and narration based on the modern implications of the third amendment.  

Explore thirty levels featuring 3D and 2D animation to find bugs in your home and protect people from being compromised.  Listen as two AI home assistants guide you through the levels and race against the time limit.

Compare your scores against other players here: https://bit.ly/Cyber-Soldiers-in-Cyber-Houses-Scores

Read the narration here: https://bit.ly/Cyber-Soldiers-Narration

Cyber Soldiers in Cyber Houses explores the future of data ethics, the regulations and protections against structural inequality perpetuated by technology.

This game debuted at Shall Makes Shall Be: The Bill of Rights at Play, Liberty Hall NYC.  https://shallmakeshallbe.org/third_amendment.html

This game was made possible by Shall Make Shall Be: The Bill of Rights at Play and the Frank Ratchye Studio for Creative Inquiry.

Special thanks to Athena Hosek for programming contributions that made the completion of this project possible.
